name: Japan 365 Days
title: Japan 365 Days

api_list.name: Check Server Condition
api_list.description: サーバーの死活状態等の情報を返します
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yambal-japan-365-days.p.rapidapi.com/service_condition"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yambal-japan-365-days.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yambal-japan-365-days.p.rapidapi.com/service_condition"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yambal-japan-365-days.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
